text: Belinda Baudin (born June 13, 1955) is an American equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the United States Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Wellington City
title: Belinda Baudin
